pages.title: This Drink
pages.text: The Aljame Teacup is a drink that gives you Regeneration for 10 seconds, Saturation for 5 seconds half of the time and Poison for 1 minute with a chance of 0.000001%. You get this when right-clicking the Meal Cooker with aljame tea, which  is get from right-clicking aljame teaboxes, that drop from Insomnia Sophies. This Drink gives you 4 nutrition and 1.2 saturation or just fulfill it all.
